queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-ops.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=release-name-ops.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-ops.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=release-name-ops.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.rules[13] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.rules[13] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, patch, delete) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Name Undefined Or Empty
queries.description: A Kubernetes Pod should have a Service Account defined so to restrict Kubernetes API access, which means the attribute 'serviceAccountName' should be defined and not empty.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-ops-test-connection.spec.serviceAccountName should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "patch", "delete"]]

queries.description: A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.containers.name=wget has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.containers.name=wget should have resources defined

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ops-server}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ops-server}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{wget}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{wget}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ops}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ops}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name=wget.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.containers.name=wget has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.containers.name=wget does not have a security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec has a security context
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ops}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-ops-server}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ops-server}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
